programme.desc: A young man from the countryside rescues his lady friend from a difficult situation and exacts vengeance upon those who have caused it.

programme.title: M\u0026M, The Incredible Twins
programme.desc: An unfortunate accident separates twins Marcelo (Jimmy Santos) and Marcelino (Herbert Bautista) at birth. Marcelo is adopted by a poor family while Marcelino grows up with their biological parents.

programme.title: Kahit Wala Ka Na
programme.desc: Love triangles will always be with us as long as romantic melodramas are made for the screen. The latest trio are Sharon Cuneta, Richard Gomez and TonTon Gutierrez. Sharon plays Irene, the wife torn between two men.

programme.title: Sala Sa Init, Sala Sa Lamig
programme.desc: Bingo was a bounty hunter. He hunted prized criminals dead or alive. On the other hand, Vina was a street hustler. They crossed paths when Bingo rented a space near Vina purposely to track down a professional hitman, Mike.

programme.title: Silakbo
programme.desc: A killer-rapist was on the prowl and all of the victims seemed to have had some sort of connection with the maverick NBI agent, Andy, played by Cesar Montano.

programme.title: Imortal (Digitally Enhanced)
programme.desc: Imortal refers to a love so great and so enduring, it defied conventions, tragedy and even the limitations of time.

programme.title: Itanong Mo Sa Buwan
programme.desc: Josie is not really a victim but Angelito's lover. He then declares they planned the whole thing to finance a new life together. Who is telling the truth?

programme.title: Psycho Sex Killer
programme.desc: A serial killer is on the loose. And the victims have one thing in common --- they are all in the care of the same psychiatrist.

programme.title: Darna, Ang Pagbabalik (Digitally Enhanced)
programme.desc: While trying to find her grandmother and little brother, Ding, Narda is viciously struck in the head and the stone that furnishes her power is stolen. Before the inevitable face-off with Valentina, Darna gains a new ally when she helps police lieutenant Max Ablan.

programme.title: Andrew Ford Medina ('Wag Kang Gamol!)
programme.desc: Andrewford Medina (Andrew E) and Jinglebert (Dennis Padilla) do odd jobs for a hotel. Andrew joins a rap competition where Gilbert challenges aspiring rappers and shows his idol who the real king of rap is.

programme.title: Pitong Gamol
programme.desc: They are uneducated but smart. They are orphans but the whole neighborhood is their family. Life treats them harshly but they survive.

programme.title: Oscar Ramos, Hitman
programme.desc: Oscar Ramos (Ramon Revilla) is a respected man in the community. He settles disputes and takes up the cudgels for the oppressed. He also has a secret -- an amulet that protects him from bullets. Will his amulet protect him when both the police and Ka Ernie's group hunt him down?

programme.title: Ikaw Ang Mahal Ko
programme.desc: The King of the Philippine Movies and the Star for All Seasons team up in this hilarious and heartwarming romantic comedy. FPJ and Vilma Santos meet in the most bungling of situations and they become fast enemies.

programme.title: Pag-ibig Ko Sa Iyo'y Totoo
programme.desc: A police officer lost his partner and girlfriend on the job. To forget the tragedy, he accepted the offer to become the bodyguard of a rich, young singing star whose father he has rescued from kidnappers.

programme.title: Bridesmaids
programme.desc: This is the story of four women in the glamorous world of fashion, about their friendships, their loves, and their careers.

programme.title: Batang Lansangan
programme.desc: Simple as his dreams would be, Ronnie Ricketts is a typical auto mechanic who wants only a peaceful and plain life. But no matter how he tried to live the life he desires, still the rotten elements of the society keep running after him.

programme.title: Somewhere (Digitally Enhanced)
programme.desc: A popular singer who was also the daughter of a judge was kidnapped by a convict he once sentenced to jail. But the act of revenge reversed itself when Lorna fell in love with her kind and caring captor.

programme.title: The Lilian Velez Story, Till Death Do Us Part
programme.desc: She was a famous young soprano turned movie actress, while he was a former child actor trying to make it as a leading man. They made a good pair on the screen. He loved her and saw their team-up as salvation of his waning career. Unable to accept the truth, he stabbed her to death one evening.

programme.title: Jessica Alfaro Story
programme.desc: One more look at the shocking Vizconde rape and murder case. This time, from the point of view of self-confessed star witness to the crime, the controversial Jessica Alfaro.

programme.title: Blondie
programme.desc: Lorna (Ilonah Jean) and her friends are gripped in fear as a serial killer is on the loose. But a pattern soon emerges. The victims are all men and a girl in blood wig is seen fleeing the scene of the crime.

programme.title: Oras-Oras, Araw-Araw
programme.desc: Jessa Rodriguez (Sharon Cuneta), a successful TV personality whose top rating show features ugly stories of poverty and hardships. She sympathizes with her subjects but it all ends there, until she meets one lady in a club.

programme.title: Simaron
programme.desc: As a martial arts expert, a graduate of the Police Academy of America and the son of a retired general, Cris could have had all the privileges possible for a career in the armed forces. However, like many of the heroes he had idolized since childhood, he chosed to go undercover.

programme.title: Masdan Mo Ang Mga Bata
programme.desc: Neneng was raped and eventually killed. Ruben was determined to exact revenge at all cost for the sake of his child and the other victims.

programme.title: Libingan Ng Mga Buhay
programme.desc: This is the true story of Rodolfo Fuentes who was unjustly sent to jail at the very young age of 14.

programme.title: Marami Ka Pang Kakaining Bigas
programme.desc: Eddie Garcia played a veteran cop who rose from the ranks and who survived by his wits. Joko Diaz, on the other hand, was a young graduate from the police academy who did everything by the book.
